threshold_rel: Maximum distance between thumb and index fingertips to trigger pinch (normalized 0-1)
hold_frames: Number of consecutive frames pinch must be held before triggering
cooldown_seconds: Minimum time between pinch detections to prevent double-triggering

min_extension_ratio: Minimum distance index finger tip must be from palm to count as pointing
max_speed: Maximum hand velocity allowed for stable pointing (prevents detection during fast movement)
max_extra_fingers: Maximum number of other fingers allowed to be extended (0=only index, 1=index+one more)
ewma_alpha: EWMA smoothing factor for speed tracking (0-1, higher=more responsive, lower=smoother)
EWMA smoothing factor for velocity (0-1, higher=more responsive, lower=smoother)
velocity_threshold_x: Minimum horizontal velocity to trigger swipe detection (normalized units/frame)
velocity_threshold_y: Minimum vertical velocity to trigger swipe detection (normalized units/frame)
confidence_ramp_up: Confidence increase per frame when movement detected (0-1, higher=faster trigger)
confidence_decay: Confidence decrease per frame when movement stops/changes (0-1, higher=faster turnoff)
confidence_threshold: Minimum confidence level to report swipe as detected (0-1, lower=easier trigger)
max_velocity_x: Maximum horizontal velocity allowed (filters sudden jumps/noise)
max_velocity_y: Maximum vertical velocity allowed (filters sudden jumps/noise)

open_ratio: Ratio threshold to detect finger as extended (tip distance / pip distance from palm)
close_ratio: Ratio threshold to detect finger as closed (hysteresis prevents flickering)
motion_speed_threshold: Hand speed above which extension thresholds are relaxed for moving hands
motion_sigmoid_k: Steepness of sigmoid curve for motion-based threshold scaling

finger_gap_threshold: Maximum allowed distance between index and middle fingers (they must stay together)
ewma_alpha: EWMA smoothing factor for spread change rate (0-1, higher=more responsive, lower=smoother)
velocity_threshold: Minimum EWMA-smoothed spread change velocity to gain confidence (normalized units/frame)
confidence_ramp_up: Confidence increase per frame when correct movement detected (0-1, higher=faster trigger)
confidence_decay: Confidence decrease per frame when movement stops/reverses (0-1, higher=faster turnoff)
confidence_threshold: Minimum confidence level to report zoom as detected (0-1, lower=easier trigger)
max_velocity: Maximum spread change velocity allowed (filters sudden jumps/noise)
require_fingers_extended: Whether to require all 3 fingers detected as extended (false=more forgiving)

min_fingers: Minimum number of fingers extended to detect open hand (4 or 5)
pinch_exclusion_distance: If thumb-index distance is below this, reject as open hand (it's a pinch)

velocity_threshold: Minimum thumb velocity to detect thumbs-up/down movement
ewma_alpha: EWMA smoothing factor for velocity (0-1, higher=more responsive)
hold_frames: Frames to wait before confirming static thumbs_up/thumbs_down (allows time to detect movement intent)
confidence_ramp_up: Confidence increase per frame when consistent movement detected
confidence_decay: Confidence decrease per frame when movement stops/changes
confidence_threshold: Minimum confidence to report moving thumbs gesture

smoothing_factor: EWMA smoothing alpha (0-1, higher=less smooth but more responsive)
bounds_padding: Pixels to keep cursor away from screen edges
precision_damping: Movement reduction factor in precision mode (lower=finer control)
dead_zone: Minimum movement threshold to trigger cursor update (normalized 0-1, reduces jitter)
magnetic_radius: Distance from current position where magnetic damping applies (normalized 0-1)
magnetic_factor: Movement reduction within magnetic radius (0-1, lower=stronger sticking)
screen_bounds_padding: Pixels to keep cursor away from screen edges (fallback when bounds not detected)
fallback_screen_width: Default screen width when screeninfo unavailable (pixels)
fallback_screen_height: Default screen height when screeninfo unavailable (pixels)

double_click_timeout: Maximum time between pinches to count as double-click (seconds)
drag_hold_duration: How long pinch must be held to start drag operation (seconds)

speed_neutral: Neutral gesture velocity where no speed modulation is applied
speed_factor: Max influence of velocity on scroll rate (0.2 = ±20% adjustment)

speed_neutral: Neutral gesture velocity where no speed modulation is applied
speed_factor: Max influence of velocity on zoom rate (0.2 = ±20% adjustment)

enabled: Enable visual overlays on video feed
show_cursor_preview: Show where cursor will move to
show_gesture_name: Display active gesture names on screen
velocity_arrow_scale: Scale factor for velocity arrow length (multiplied by frame diagonal)
velocity_threshold_highlight: Speed threshold above which velocity arrow is highlighted (normalized)
fingertip_dim_factor: Color dimming factor for non-extended fingers (0-1)

margin: Outer margin from frame edges in pixels
base_width: Base width for debug panels in pixels
line_height: Height per metadata line in pixels
title_height: Height for panel title in pixels
spacing_buffer: Extra buffer space to prevent panel overlap in pixels
start_y_offset: Additional Y offset for first panel positioning (pixels)
scan_step_horizontal: Horizontal scan step when searching for panel placement (pixels)
scan_step_vertical: Vertical scan step when searching for panel placement (pixels)

max_height: Maximum height for main gesture panel (pixels)
panel_y: Y position offset for gesture panel (pixels)
panel_left_x: Left edge X position for gesture panel (pixels)
title_y_offset: Y offset for panel title from panel top (pixels)
title_x: X position for panel title text (pixels)
separator_y_offset: Y spacing after title before separator (pixels)
max_gestures_display: Maximum number of gestures to display in panel
gesture_indicator_x: X position for gesture indicator circle (pixels)
gesture_name_x: X position for gesture name text (pixels)
gesture_name_y_adjust: Y adjustment for gesture name text alignment (pixels)
hint_x: X position for metadata hint text (pixels)
spacing_with_hint: Y spacing when hint is present (pixels)

crosshair_gap: Gap from center to crosshair start (pixels)

pulse_frequency: Frequency of pulse animation for gestures (Hz)

left_hand: BGR color for left hand visualization
right_hand: BGR color for right hand visualization
active_gesture: BGR color for active gesture indicators

hand_still_threshold: Maximum velocity for hand to be considered 'still' (normalized units/sec)
pan_velocity_threshold: Minimum velocity for pan gesture to trigger (normalized units/sec)
draw_velocity_threshold: Minimum velocity for draw mode movement (normalized units/sec)
precision_damping_factor: Speed reduction in precision cursor mode (0-1, lower=finer control)
two_hand_distance_threshold: Minimum distance change for two-hand resize detection (normalized)
warp_min_distance: Minimum distance between hands for warp/teleport gesture (normalized)

fps: Requested frames per second (actual may vary)

use_gpu: Use GPU acceleration for hand detection (requires compatible GPU, falls back to CPU if unavailable)
show_debug_info: Print detailed gesture detection info to console
max_hands: Maximum number of hands to detect (1 or 2)
gesture_history_maxlen: Maximum frames to keep in gesture history buffer per hand
bimanual_history_maxlen: Maximum frames to keep in bimanual gesture state history

fps_update_interval: Update FPS calculation every N frames
visual_mode: Visual feedback mode: 'full' (OpenCV window + Status), 'minimal' (Status only), 'debug' (Full + Console)

size: Size of the status indicator in pixels
stickers_base_path: Base directory for gesture sticker images (relative to config or absolute path)

thumbs_up: Sticker for static thumbs up gesture
thumbs_down: Sticker for static thumbs down gesture
thumbs_up_moving_up: Sticker for thumbs up moving upward
thumbs_up_moving_down: Sticker for thumbs up moving downward
thumbs_down_moving_up: Sticker for thumbs down moving upward
thumbs_down_moving_down: Sticker for thumbs down moving downward
precision_cursor: Sticker for bimanual precision cursor mode

pause: Set to true to pause gesture control (hot-reloaded)
exit: Set to true to gracefully exit the application (hot-reloaded)
